channel.title: EasyRSC v1.1 Few questions
channel.description:
I'v searched to finding no solutions.
1. [s]Changing starting place I just like to know what file this is in.[/s]
2. [s]How to make master fisher give fish.[/s]
3. [s]Setting IP in the client to connect to me. I can't find the file settings.ini only find settings config file.[/s]
4. [s]What file is the starting items in?[/s]
5. [s]Can't figure out how to make the new charater start out with iron 2h.. found out how to start with coins but not both.[/s]
6. [s]how to change price of items in the shop.[/s]
7. [s]I found spawn times in NPCdef but is the number in seconds? I modified it to 3 and recompiled it. appeared spawn time didn't change.[/s]
8. Having trouble getting back ground switched got the file 3150 but it shows as file type "file". Ms paint won't open suggest a graphics program that works?
9. [s]Useing 7zip how do i make it a .gz? Its not under the pull down tabs.[/s]
10. [s]How can i look at my errors they just pop up real fast and dissapear?[/s]
11. shoperkeepers need to be able to buy random items.
Any help would highly be appreciated.

item.title: EasyRSC v1.1 Few questions
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

10. How can i look at my errors they just pop up real fast and dissapear?

There are a few ways to do this and the most popular would be to add a pause to ant if you are unsure how to do there is a tut posted.

If you cant get it to work then use the cmd - when using the cmd you will need to tell it where your directory is by typing “cd” this is to change dir… then type where your compile is located for example you might type something like:

cd c:\users\yourname\desktop\rsc\server press enter and this will then set the path to your server… then just type compile.bat but make sure you type it exactly how it is in your server dir eg. compile_server.bat or compile.server.bat ect ect.

The cmd will not automatically close and you will be able to see errors.

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC v1.1 Few questions
item.dc:creator: @Nuk Nuk
item.description:
@Nuk wrote:

7. I found spawn times in NPCdef but is the number in seconds? I modified it to 3 and recompiled it. appeared spawn time didn't change.
Compile only if youre editing .java files. To edit XML files, you would need a compression tool or 7zip

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @dragonmon12 dragonmon12
item.description:
@dragonmon12 wrote:

[quote=“Nuk, post:3, topic:324650”][quote]
5. Can’t figure out how to make the new charater start out with iron 2h… found out how to start with coins but not items.
[/quote]
This is also in template file, just edit coins id(10) to iron 2hs id (77)[/quote]

Not that easy already tryed. its just changing the amount of coins. I think it has something to do with inventory count went account is created…im so close to getting it i can feel it but i can’t figure it out.
here is the template.

[code]#Character Data.

As i understand it which isnt right that i1 must be the item ID when ia1= amount now i tryed to break it down even further that i= inventory and 1 is the slot but when i edit in an item thats not stackable i can’t seam to get it to work,
